ITEM.TEXT: STAD record Set With Sub Records

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type of declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or type declarations) you need for *"* components in the private section
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* use this source file for the definition and implementation of *"* local helper classes, interface definitions and type *"* declarations
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class

ITEM.TEXT: STAD Data Parsing Interface voir CL_SWNC_READER_WLOAD
SAP Workload NW Collector: Name of the Statistics File

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA o_filter TYPE REF TO if_swnc_records_filter. DATA o_reader TYPE REF TO ygpl_stad_reader.
CREATE OBJECT o_filter TYPE ygpl_stad_no_filter. CREATE OBJECT o_reader TYPE ygpl_stad_reader EXPORTING i_filename = stad_filename.
CALL METHOD super->constructor EXPORTING i_filter = o_filter i_reader = o_reader.
me->out_filename = output_filename. me->o_data_parsing = o_data_parsing. SET HANDLER initialize_read finalize_read FOR o_reader. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0.

` DATA line TYPE string. OPEN DATASET out_filename FOR OUTPUT IN TEXT MODE ENCODING DEFAULT. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ycx_gpl_file_save_error EXPORTING filetype = 'S' filename = out_filename. ENDIF. line = o_data_parsing->get_header( ). TRANSFER line TO out_filename. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ycx_gpl_file_save_error EXPORTING filetype = 'S' filename = out_filename. ENDIF.
` DATA lv_struct TYPE any. lv_struct = o_data_parsing->convert_mainrec_to_structure( i_statrec ). INSERT INTO stad CONNECTION stad VALUES lv_struct. ADD 1 TO rec_count.

ITEM.TEXT: STAD Data Parsing Interface voir CL_SWNC_READER_WLOAD
